title: “Pulmonary arterial hypertension in patients treated with interferon.” Laurent Savale, Caroline Sattler, Sven Günther, David Montani, Marie-Camille Chaumais, Swanny Perrin, Xavier Jaïs, Andrei Seferian, Roland Jovan, Sophie Bulifon, Florence Parent, Gérald Simonneau, Marc Humbert and Olivier Sitbon. Eur Respir J 2014; 44: 1627–1634.
